comments.html:
Just to second the "As I’ve stated in the original article, if prepending your AS number a few times doesn’t help, nothing will." one, There is a nice study on AS path prepending subject published as "A performance evaluation of BGP-based traffic engineering" paper. This paper shows that massive AS prepending doesn't do any good.

HTH
comments.name: Alexei Monastyrnyi

comments.html:
Thanks for the hint, it's truly an interesting article.

The maximum amount of prepending that makes sense is the difference in AS-path lengths to Tier-1 providers between your upstream ISPs ... I would be surprised if you'd ever need more than 4-5 prepends.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
